verbose_text: Having this powerful imaging technique at hand is highly interesting in several regards : a) it can provide detailed and quantitative information on the density, frequency and kinetics of CXCR4 expression in various diseases; b) it might provide a means for patient selection, treatment planning and monitoring in diseases where CXCR4 targeted treatment is now and in the future evaluated, and c) it opens a broad field of clinical investigations on the relevance of CXCR4 expression and regulation for a multitude of biological processes.
